vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 6 Issue 4 December 1997

FOSTER

CARE

MEETINGS

You're interested in fostering a rescue rabbit but are unsure of what fostering is. Come to the HRS Adoption Center at the BEST LITTLE RABBIT RODENT AND FERRET HOUSE on Wednesday, December 10, 1997, 7-9pm; or Monday, January 12, 1998, 6:30-8:30pm; and we'll answer your questions and concerns. Everyone is invited, so if you know of a friend that may be interested in helping a foster rabbit, bring them along! You won't be obligated to foster a rabbit if you attend the meeting (although we hope you will decide to).

HRS Adoption Center/

Best Little Rabbit Rodent & Ferret House

14325 Lake City Way NE

Seattle, WA 98125

Ph: (206) 365-9105
